item.title: Atmosphere - When Life Gives You Lemons, You Paint That Shit Gold - Standard Edition
item.description: massdosage says: "New Atmosphere album. I just started listening to it and I'm liking - they seem to have added quite a bit of live instrumentation to their sound. "Dreamer" is dope."
